.
Handling Other Special Situations
For information on handling the failure of a(n)
claimant to furnish requested evidence, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.A.4
, and
incompetent Veteran to report for an examination, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.D.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Failure to Report for Review Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
